name: Conway's game of life (Metylene)
description:
Controls

P - Pause/Unpause the automatic generations

Left Click / Right Click to add/remove Cells.

Spacebar - Go to the next generation.

Uploaded mostly if someone want to play with it in Superpowers.

The source code is available. You need to Unzip and move it to the projects folder of your Superpowers server. To find it easily, go to the settings of your server when it isn't running. There is a button to the projects folder.
